docs.title: “SSI defines the actors. ToIP defines the digital trust stack. STF orchestrates the interactions where trust actually emerges.”
What is STF?
docs.text:
The Sovereign Trust Framework is a standardization & interoperability framework for ToIP. It builds on:

  • Self-Sovereign Identity (SSI)
  • Trust over IP (ToIP)

STF adds the missing layer: structured interactions and trust logic that allow these actors to exchange, evaluate, and prove trust without relying on central authorities.
